title: Get started with rstudiothemes
text: install built-RStudio themes come package: add many popular themes (e.g., Tokyo Night, Nord, Winter Coming, Dracula, etc.) RStudio themes directory. see themes available now:
code: install_rstudiothemes()  #> ✔ Installed 27 themes #> ℹ Use `rstudiothemes::list_rstudiothemes()` to list installed themes #> ℹ Use `rstudiothemes::try_rstudiothemes()` to try all installed themes list_rstudiothemes(list_installed = FALSE) #>  [1] "ayu Dark"                   "ayu Light"                  #>  [3] "cobalt2"                    "CRAN"                       #>  [5] "Dracula2025"                "GitHub Dark"                #>  [7] "GitHub Light"               "JellyFish Theme"            #>  [9] "Matrix"                     "Night Owl"                  #> [11] "Night Owl Light"            "Nord"                       #> [13] "OKSolar Dark"               "OKSolar Light"              #> [15] "OKSolar Sky"                "Overflow Dark"              #> [17] "Overflow Light"             "Panda Syntax"               #> [19] "Selenized Dark"             "Selenized Light"            #> [21] "Skeletor Syntax"            "SynthWave 84"               #> [23] "Tokyo Night"                "Tokyo Night Light"          #> [25] "Tokyo Night Storm"          "Winter is Coming Dark Blue" #> [27] "Winter is Coming Light"

title: Get started with rstudiothemes
text: can quickly preview themes directly R: Pass subset styles (e.g., "dark" "light") needed.
code: try_rstudiothemes()

title: Get started with rstudiothemes
text: installing themes, apply one using RStudio API: Alternatively, go Tools → Global Options → Appearance RStudio select installed theme.
code: rstudioapi::applyTheme("Winter is Coming Dark Blue")

title: Get started with rstudiothemes
text: can convert VS Code TextMate theme file RStudio theme: function convert install theme immediately, optionally applying (apply = TRUE).
code: convert_to_rstudio_theme("<path/to/vscode-theme.json>",   apply = TRUE, force = TRUE )

what: Workflow Example: From VS Code Theme to RStudio
title: Get started with rstudiothemes
text: Choose theme .json VS Code. Convert install convert_to_rstudio_theme(). Apply rstudioapi::applyTheme() via RStudio UI. workflow lets easily bring preferred editor theme RStudio.

title: Get started with rstudiothemes
text: List installed themes: list_rstudiothemes(list_installed = TRUE) Try specific categories: filter themes Light/Dark style Use Add-Theme UI: RStudio’s Global Options → Appearance → Add Theme manually add .rstheme files ’ve created converted.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Diego Hernangómez. Author, maintainer, copyright holder. Garrick Aden-Buie. Copyright holder.           rsthemes::try_rsthemes() function

title: Authors and Citation
text: Hernangómez D (2026). rstudiothemes: Create RStudio Themes Visual Studio Code TextMate Themes. doi:10.5281/zenodo.18519156, https://dieghernan.github.io/rstudiothemes/.
code: @Manual{R-rstudiothemes,   title = {{rstudiothemes}: Create {RStudio} Themes from {Visual Studio Code} and {TextMate} Themes},   doi = {10.5281/zenodo.18519156},   author = {Diego Hernangómez},   year = {2026},   version = {0.1.0.9000},   url = {https://dieghernan.github.io/rstudiothemes/},   abstract = {Create and install RStudio themes derived from Visual Studio Code and TextMate themes. Provides functions to convert between TextMate and Visual Studio Code themes, as well as ports of several Visual Studio Code themes.}, }

title: Contributing to rstudiothemes
text: outlines propose change rstudiothemes. detailed discussion contributing tidyverse packages, please see development contributing guide code review principles.

title: Contributing to rstudiothemes
text: can fix typos, spelling mistakes, grammatical errors documentation directly using GitHub web interface, long changes made source file. generally means ’ll need edit roxygen2 comments .R, .Rd file. can find .R file generates .Rd reading comment first line.

title: Contributing to rstudiothemes
text: want make bigger change, ’s good idea first file issue make sure someone team agrees ’s needed. ’ve found bug, please file issue illustrates bug minimal reprex (also help write unit test, needed). See guide create great issue advice.

title: Contributing to rstudiothemes
text: Fork package clone onto computer. haven’t done , recommend using usethis::create_from_github("dieghernan/rstudiothemes", fork = TRUE). Install development dependencies devtools::install_dev_deps(), make sure package passes R CMD check running devtools::check(). R CMD check doesn’t pass cleanly, ’s good idea ask help continuing. Create Git branch pull request (PR). recommend using usethis::pr_init("brief-description--change"). Make changes, commit git, create PR running usethis::pr_push(), following prompts browser. title PR briefly describe change. body PR contain Fixes #issue-number. user-facing changes, add bullet top NEWS.md (.e. just first header). Follow style described https://style.tidyverse.org/news.html.

title: Contributing to rstudiothemes
text: New code follow tidyverse style guide. can use Air apply style, please don’t restyle code nothing PR. use roxygen2, Markdown syntax, documentation. use testthat unit tests. Contributions test cases included easier accept.

title: Contributing to rstudiothemes
text: contributing guide adapted tidyverse contributing guide available https://tidyverse.tidyverse.org/CONTRIBUTING.html.

what: rstudiothemes | Create RStudio themes from Visual Studio Code and TextMate themes
title: rstudiothemes | Create RStudio themes from Visual Studio Code and TextMate themes
text: Convert Visual Studio Code TextMate themes RStudio custom themes. package provides tools easily convert Visual Studio Code TextMate theme files (.json .tmTheme formats) RStudio-compatible .rstheme files. RStudio supported custom themes .rstheme format since version 1.2+.

title: rstudiothemes | Create RStudio themes from Visual Studio Code and TextMate themes
text: Convert Visual Studio Code TextMate themes RStudio .rstheme format. Bidirectional conversion Visual Studio Code TextMate themes. Organize manage custom themes reproducible way. Integrates R tooling easier installation testing. Includes ports popular Visual Studio Code themes ready use RStudio.

title: rstudiothemes | Create RStudio themes from Visual Studio Code and TextMate themes
text: package includes ports several popular Visual Studio Code themes, ready use RStudio. Simply use install_rstudiothemes() function install RStudio environment: Screenshot theme Winter Coming Dark Blue Available themes include popular choices Tokyo Night, Night Owl, Winter Coming, SynthWave 84, Nord, many others: also distribute themes single .zip file https://dieghernan.github.io/rstudiothemes/dist/rstudiothemes.zip. Unzip install using RStudio IDE interface.
code: rstudiothemes::install_rstudiothemes()  #> ✔ Installed 27 themes #> ℹ Use `rstudiothemes::list_rstudiothemes()` to list installed themes #> ℹ Use `rstudiothemes::try_rstudiothemes()` to try all installed themes  rstudioapi::applyTheme("Winter is Coming Dark Blue") rstudiothemes::list_rstudiothemes(list_installed = FALSE) #>  [1] "ayu Dark"                   "ayu Light"                  #>  [3] "cobalt2"                    "CRAN"                       #>  [5] "Dracula2025"                "GitHub Dark"                #>  [7] "GitHub Light"               "JellyFish Theme"            #>  [9] "Matrix"                     "Night Owl"                  #> [11] "Night Owl Light"            "Nord"                       #> [13] "OKSolar Dark"               "OKSolar Light"              #> [15] "OKSolar Sky"                "Overflow Dark"              #> [17] "Overflow Light"             "Panda Syntax"               #> [19] "Selenized Dark"             "Selenized Light"            #> [21] "Skeletor Syntax"            "SynthWave 84"               #> [23] "Tokyo Night"                "Tokyo Night Light"          #> [25] "Tokyo Night Storm"          "Winter is Coming Dark Blue" #> [27] "Winter is Coming Light"

title: rstudiothemes | Create RStudio themes from Visual Studio Code and TextMate themes

code: # install.packages("pak") pak::pak("dieghernan/rstudiothemes") # Install rstudiothemes in R: install.packages(   "rstudiothemes",   repos = c(     "https://dieghernan.r-universe.dev",     "https://cloud.r-project.org"   ) )

title: rstudiothemes | Create RStudio themes from Visual Studio Code and TextMate themes
text: can convert Visual Studio Code TextMate theme RStudio format. ’s : Use favorite Visual Studio Code TextMate theme file URL online theme. Use convert_to_rstudio_theme() function convert install : Alternatively, install .rstheme file via RStudio UI: Tools → Global Options → Appearance Example update themes RStudio IDE
code: rstudiothemes::convert_to_rstudio_theme("<path/to/file>", apply = TRUE, force = TRUE)

what: Bidirectional conversion Visual Studio Code - TextMate
title: rstudiothemes | Create RStudio themes from Visual Studio Code and TextMate themes
text: package also includes conversion functions convert_vs_to_tm_theme() convert_tm_to_vs_theme(), allowing convert themes directions needed.

title: rstudiothemes | Create RStudio themes from Visual Studio Code and TextMate themes
text: rstudiothemes provide built-theme editor, can create themes scratch using following tools: TextMate .tmTheme: https://tmtheme-editor.linuxbox.ninja/. Also see official RStudio documentation creating themes. Visual Studio Code .json: See official documentation creating color themes.

title: rstudiothemes | Create RStudio themes from Visual Studio Code and TextMate themes
text: Contributions welcome! contribute project: Open issue discuss ideas proposed changes. Fork repository create feature branch. Submit pull request clear commit messages descriptions.

what: Convert a TextMate theme into a Visual Studio Code theme — convert_tm_to_vs_theme
title: Convert a TextMate theme into a Visual Studio Code theme — convert_tm_to_vs_theme
text: Read .tmTheme file representing TextMate theme write equivalent Visual Studio Code theme (.json).

title: Convert a TextMate theme into a Visual Studio Code theme — convert_tm_to_vs_theme
code: convert_tm_to_vs_theme(   path,   outfile = tempfile(fileext = ".json"),   name = NULL,   author = NULL )

title: Convert a TextMate theme into a Visual Studio Code theme — convert_tm_to_vs_theme
text: path Path URL TextMate theme, .tmTheme format. outfile Path resulting file written. default temporary file (tempfile()). name Optional. name theme. provided, name theme path used. author Optional. author theme. provided, author path used, default value assigned.

title: Convert a TextMate theme into a Visual Studio Code theme — convert_tm_to_vs_theme
text: function called side effects. writes new .json file outfile returns path.

title: Convert a TextMate theme into a Visual Studio Code theme — convert_tm_to_vs_theme
code: tmtheme <- system.file("ext/test.tmTheme",   package = "rstudiothemes" ) path <- convert_tm_to_vs_theme(tmtheme)  readLines(path) |>   head(50) |>   cat(sep = "\n") #> { #>   // Created with the R package rstudiothemes (c) dieghernan. #>   // https://github.com/dieghernan/rstudiothemes #>   "name": "Testing RStudioTheme", #>   "author": "rstudiothemes", #>   "semanticHighlighting": true, #>   "type": "dark", #>   "tokenColors": [ #>     { #>       "settings": { #>         "background": "#2B2836", #>         "foreground": "#DCE7FD" #>       } #>     }, #>     { #>       "name": "comment", #>       "scope": "comment", #>       "settings": { #>         "foreground": "#655E7F" #>       } #>     }, #>     { #>       "name": "doctype", #>       "scope": ["meta.tag.metadata.doctype", "meta.tag.sgml.doctype.html", "meta.tag.sgml.html"], #>       "settings": { #>         "foreground": "#655E7F" #>       } #>     }, #>     { #>       "name": "punctuation", #>       "scope": ["punctuation.definition.tag", "punctuation.separator"], #>       "settings": { #>         "foreground": "#DCE7FD" #>       } #>     }, #>     { #>       "name": "namespace,", #>       "scope": ["entity.name.type.namespace", "storage.modifier.import"], #>       "settings": { #>         "foreground": "#6A6872" #>       } #>     }, #>     { #>       "name": "string", #>       "scope": "string", #>       "settings": { #>         "foreground": "#93B4FF" #>       } #>     }, #>     {

what: Convert a TextMate or VS Code theme to an RStudio theme — convert_to_rstudio_theme
title: Convert a TextMate or VS Code theme to an RStudio theme — convert_to_rstudio_theme
text: Read .tmTheme .json file defines TextMate Visual Studio Code theme write equivalent RStudio theme .rstheme. Optionally, generated theme can installed applied RStudio IDE. Important: function works RStudio; returns NULL called IDEs.

title: Convert a TextMate or VS Code theme to an RStudio theme — convert_to_rstudio_theme
code: convert_to_rstudio_theme(   path,   outfile = tempfile(fileext = ".rstheme"),   name = NULL,   use_italics = TRUE,   output_style = "expanded",   force = FALSE,   apply = FALSE )

title: Convert a TextMate or VS Code theme to an RStudio theme — convert_to_rstudio_theme
text: path Path URL TextMate theme (.tmTheme format) Visual Studio Code theme (.json format). outfile Path resulting file written. default temporary file (tempfile()). name Optional. name theme. provided, name theme path used. use_italics Logical. Whether use italics resulting theme. default TRUE, themes may look better without italics. output_style Bracketing formatting style CSS output. Possible styles: "nested", "expanded", "compact", "compressed". force Whether force operation overwrite existing file name. Default: FALSE. apply Logical. Apply theme rstudioapi::applyTheme().

title: Convert a TextMate or VS Code theme to an RStudio theme — convert_to_rstudio_theme
text: function called side effects. writes new .rstheme file outfile returns path. force apply TRUE, install apply theme RStudio IDE.

title: Convert a TextMate or VS Code theme to an RStudio theme — convert_to_rstudio_theme
text: RStudio supports custom editor themes two formats: .tmTheme .rstheme. .tmTheme format originated TextMate become common theme format. tmTheme editor hosts large collection .tmTheme files. .rstheme format specific RStudio. switch editor themes, go Tools > Global Options > Appearance use Editor theme selector.  information, see https://docs.posit.co/ide/user/ide/guide/ui/appearance.html.

title: Convert a TextMate or VS Code theme to an RStudio theme — convert_to_rstudio_theme
code: if (on_rstudio() && interactive()) {   vstheme <- system.file("ext/skeletor-syntax-color-theme.json",     package = "rstudiothemes"   )    # Apply the theme for 10 seconds to demonstrate the effect    current_theme <- rstudioapi::getThemeInfo()$editor    # Current theme name:   current_theme   new_rs_theme <- convert_to_rstudio_theme(vstheme,     name = "A testing theme",     apply = TRUE, force = TRUE   )    Sys.sleep(10)    rstudioapi::applyTheme(current_theme)   rstudioapi::removeTheme("A testing theme") } #> ℹ Detected GUI: "RTerm".

code: vstheme <- system.file("ext/test-simple-color-theme.json",   package = "rstudiothemes" ) path <- convert_vs_to_tm_theme(vstheme) #> ! VSCode theme "Skeletor Syntax" does not have author, use the `author` argument. #> ℹ Using `author = "rstudiothemes R package"`.  readLines(path) |>   head(50) |>   cat(sep = "\n") #> <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> #> <plist version="1.0"> #>   <dict> #>     <key>name</key> #>     <string>Skeletor Syntax</string> #>     <key>author</key> #>     <string>rstudiothemes R package</string> #>     <key>colorSpaceName</key> #>     <string>sRGB</string> #>     <key>semanticClass</key> #>     <string>theme.dark.skeletor_syntax</string> #>     <key>comment</key> #>     <string>Generated with rstudiothemes R package</string> #>     <key>uuid</key> #>     <string>65316264-3362-4031-a334-396431643737</string> #>     <key>settings</key> #>     <array> #>       <dict> #>         <key>settings</key> #>         <dict> #>           <key>background</key> #>           <string>#2B2836</string> #>           <key>foreground</key> #>           <string>#DCE7FD</string> #>           <key>selection</key> #>           <string>#55535E</string> #>           <key>lineHighlight</key> #>           <string>#55535E</string> #>           <key>caret</key> #>           <string>#BD93F9</string> #>           <key>invisibles</key> #>           <string>#363340</string> #>           <key>gutterForeground</key> #>           <string>#655E7F</string> #>         </dict> #>       </dict> #>       <dict> #>         <key>name</key> #>         <string>comment</string> #>         <key>scope</key> #>         <string>comment</string> #>         <key>settings</key> #>         <dict> #>           <key>foreground</key> #>           <string>#655E7F</string> #>         </dict> #>       </dict> #>       <dict> #>         <key>name</key> #>         <string>doctype</string>

title: Generate random UUIDs — generate_uuid
text: Generate version 4 (pseudo-random) Universally Unique Identifiers (UUIDs).

title: Generate random UUIDs — generate_uuid
code: generate_uuid(hint = NULL)

title: Generate random UUIDs — generate_uuid
text: Heavily based unreleased version ids::uuid().

title: Generate random UUIDs — generate_uuid
text: hint Optional. character string (object coercible .character()) used random seed.

title: Generate random UUIDs — generate_uuid
text: character string representing valid UUID can validated uuid::UUIDvalidate().

title: Generate random UUIDs — generate_uuid
text: helper function assigns UUID identifying versions generated themes.

title: Generate random UUIDs — generate_uuid
text: Davis KR, Peabody B, Leach P (2024). "Universally Unique IDentifiers (UUIDs)." RFC 9562. doi:10.17487/RFC9562 , https://www.rfc-editor.org/info/rfc9562.

title: Generate random UUIDs — generate_uuid
code: # Random generate_uuid() #> [1] "9ec3e5c8-c404-4e17-8e4c-81bd36aa3d2a"  generate_uuid() #> [1] "04d42bbc-2145-4ebe-83ef-a1a2d8d52a86"  # Persistent with hint param  hint <- "something as seed"  generate_uuid(hint) #> [1] "736f6d65-7468-496e-a720-617320736565"  generate_uuid(hint) #> [1] "736f6d65-7468-496e-a720-617320736565"

code: the_theme <- system.file("ext/test-color-theme.json",   package = "rstudiothemes" ) |>   # Convert the Visual Studio Code theme to TextMate format   convert_vs_to_tm_theme()  # Check readLines(the_theme) |>   head(10) |>   cat(sep = "\n") #> <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> #> <plist version="1.0"> #>   <dict> #>     <key>name</key> #>     <string>Tokyo Night</string> #>     <key>author</key> #>     <string>Enkia, rstudiothemes R package</string> #>     <key>colorSpaceName</key> #>     <string>sRGB</string> #>     <key>semanticClass</key>  read_tm_theme(the_theme) #> # A tibble: 372 × 7 #>    section   name              scope value       foreground background fontStyle #>    <chr>     <chr>             <chr> <chr>       <chr>      <lgl>      <chr>     #>  1 highlevel name              NA    Tokyo Night NA         NA         NA        #>  2 highlevel author            NA    Enkia, rst… NA         NA         NA        #>  3 highlevel colorSpaceName    NA    sRGB        NA         NA         NA        #>  4 highlevel semanticClass     NA    theme.dark… NA         NA         NA        #>  5 highlevel comment           NA    Generated … NA         NA         NA        #>  6 highlevel uuid              NA    39323639-3… NA         NA         NA        #>  7 colors    background        NA    NA          #1A1B26    NA         NA        #>  8 colors    foreground        NA    NA          #A9B1D6    NA         NA        #>  9 colors    selection         NA    NA          #515C7E4D  NA         NA        #> 10 colors    inactiveSelection NA    NA          #515C7E25  NA         NA        #> # ℹ 362 more rows

what: Install, list, try or remove RStudio themes — rstudiothemes-actions
title: Install, list, try or remove RStudio themes — rstudiothemes-actions
text: Adaptation rsthemes functions, MIT License Copyright © rsthemes authors. Important: functions (except list_rstudiothemes(list_installed = FALSE)) work RStudio; return NULL called IDEs.

title: Install, list, try or remove RStudio themes — rstudiothemes-actions
code: install_rstudiothemes(   style = c("all", "dark", "light"),   themes = NULL,   destdir = NULL )  remove_rstudiothemes(style = c("all", "dark", "light"))  list_rstudiothemes(style = c("all", "dark", "light"), list_installed = TRUE)  try_rstudiothemes(style = c("all", "dark", "light"), themes = NULL, delay = 0)

title: Install, list, try or remove RStudio themes — rstudiothemes-actions
text: style Character. Limit themes specific group: , dark, light. themes Optional character vector theme names. provided, themes used, style ignored. destdir Optional directory .rstheme files. default uses rstudioapi::addTheme(), argument allows installation non-standard directories. list_installed installed rstudiothemes themes listed (default). FALSE, available themes rstudiothemes package listed instead. delay Number seconds wait themes. Set 0 prompted continue theme.

title: Install, list, try or remove RStudio themes — rstudiothemes-actions
text: install_rstudiothemes(): Install RStudio themes remove_rstudiothemes(): Remove rstudiothemes RStudio list_rstudiothemes(): List installed available themes try_rstudiothemes(): Try rstudiothemes RStudio theme

title: Install, list, try or remove RStudio themes — rstudiothemes-actions
text: rstudiothemes includes RStudio themes based following Visual Studio Code themes: Ayu teabyii. Cobalt2 Theme Official Wes Bos. CRAN dieghernan, based CRAN (R Project) website theme, created Pandoc Dracula Official https://draculatheme.com/. GitHub Dark Light GitHub. JellyFish Theme Pawel Borkar. Matrix Theme UstymUkhman. Night Owl Dark Light (italics) Sarah Drasner. Nord Arctic Ice Studio. OKSolar Theme dieghernan. Overflow Theme dieghernan. Panda Theme Panda Theme. Selenized Themes dieghernan. Skeletor Syntax dieghernan. SynthWave '84 Robb Owen. Tokyo Night Enkia. Winter Coming Theme John Papa.

title: Install, list, try or remove RStudio themes — rstudiothemes-actions
text: Aden-Buie G (2026). rsthemes: Full Themes RStudio v1.2+. R package version 0.5.1, commit 48fc078f772e5e63669bc9773eabc8e9cdc7f699, https://github.com/gadenbuie/rsthemes.

title: Install, list, try or remove RStudio themes — rstudiothemes-actions
text: Garrick Aden-Buie https://github.com/gadenbuie

title: Install, list, try or remove RStudio themes — rstudiothemes-actions

what: rstudiothemes: Create 'RStudio' Themes from Visual Studio Code and 'TextMate' Themes — rstudiothemes-package
title: rstudiothemes: Create 'RStudio' Themes from Visual Studio Code and 'TextMate' Themes — rstudiothemes-package
text: Create install 'RStudio' themes derived Visual Studio Code 'TextMate' themes. Provides functions convert 'TextMate' Visual Studio Code themes, well ports several Visual Studio Code themes.

title: rstudiothemes: Create 'RStudio' Themes from Visual Studio Code and 'TextMate' Themes — rstudiothemes-package
